Summary: videoing the moon this large blue orb next to the moon
divs: sighting detailsin the back yard videoing the moon this large blue orb moving very slow what seem to be orbiting the moon. video it for about one hour saved 15 min. of it. followed it about 1\4 going around the moon....maybe a star but neaver seen this happen before.
